text:
John Adedayo B. Adegboyega (born 17 March 1992), better known as John Boyega, is a British actor. He is best known for playing Finn in ' (2015), ' (2017) and ' (2019). He has also appeared in "Attack the Block" (2011), "Detroit" (2017) and ' (2018). He won the 2016 BAFTA Rising Star Award.
Boyega was born in Peckham, London. His parents are Nigerian.
